about_the_game:
Welcome to Dumb Witchfinder - an exciting roguelike platformer game with pixel art graphics. Your task is to survive in a deep forest full of nimble little demons. These creatures will try to stop you, and you need to dodge their attacks and strike back to kill them all. The further you go into the forest, the more demons you will encounter.

The pleasant pixel graphics and unobtrusive color palette create a cozy game atmosphere. The intuitive gameplay and simple controls allow you to dive right into the game without long introductions or learning the rules.

Kill enemies to progress through the levels and earn coins. Coins can be spent on upgrades to become faster, stronger, and more resilient, and to defeat all the demons.

Game Features:

Pixel art graphics and pleasant color palette
Intuitive gameplay and simple controls
Exciting roguelike platformer
Character upgrade system
Engaging levels with increasing difficulty

name: Dumb Witchfinder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB) or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Dumb Witchfinder is a 2D pixel roguelike platformer where you play as a dark elf battling demons in a forest. Dodge enemy attacks and kill them to upgrade your abilities.
